knimeNode.name: Shape Manager
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns shapes to one selected nominal column.

fullDescription.intro: Shapes can be assigned to one selected nominal column. All possible for one column are shown in the table in values are shown in the table and maximum value. The values are then computed during execute.
fullDescription.option: Select the column whose possible values should be used for shape selection.
Clicking on the second column allows to change the shape per column value.

ports.dataIn: Table to which shape settings should be applied
ports.dataOut: Same table with shape information appended to one attribute
ports.modelOut: Shape settings applied to the input table
